quote: The failing [@nytimes](https://twitter.com/nytimes) was forced to apologize to its subscribers for the poor reporting it did on my election win. Now they are worse!
quotePlain: The failing @nytimes was forced to apologize to its subscribers for the poor reporting it did on my election win. Now they are worse!
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: There was no apology in the letter, but the president is trying hard to convince voters that there was.
checks.quotePlain: There was no apology in the letter, but the president is trying hard to convince voters that there was.

claims.title: New York Times apologized to Trump for coverage
claims.negative: New York Times did not apologize to Trump for coverage
claims.negativePlain: New York Times did not apologize to Trump for coverage
